verses.text: How dear \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* tents, O Lord \w of|strong="H1121"\w* armies!

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* passion \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* soul's desire \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* house \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*; \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* flesh \w are|strong="H4100"\w* crying \w out|strong="H4100"\w* \w for|strong="H6635"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* living \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0413"\w* little birds \w have|strong="H1571"\w* places \w for|strong="H7442"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5315"\w*, \w where|strong="H0413"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H3615"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* young, \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* altars, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* armies, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* King \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.

Happy \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* resting-place \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: \w they|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w still|strong="H1571"\w* \w be|strong="H1571"\w* praising \w you|strong="H0834"\w*. (Selah.)

\w Happy|strong="H0835"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* man whose strength \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H5750"\w*; \w in|strong="H3427"\w* whose heart \w are|strong="H0835"\w* \w the|strong="H1984"\w* highways \w to|strong="H1004"\w* Zion.

Going through \w the|strong="H5797"\w* valley \w of|strong="H3824"\w* balsam-trees, \w they|strong="H4546"\w* make it a place \w of|strong="H3824"\w* springs; it \w is|strong="H3824"\w* clothed with blessings \w by|strong="H0120"\w* \w the|strong="H5797"\w* early rain.

\w They|strong="H1571"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w from|strong="H1571"\w* strength \w to|strong="H1571"\w* strength; every one \w of|strong="H6010"\w* \w them|strong="H7896"\w* comes before God \w in|strong="H1571"\w* Zion.

\w O|strong="H0430"\w* Lord \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w armies|strong="H2428"\w*, let \w my|strong="H7200"\w* prayer come \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H7200"\w*: \w give|strong="H7200"\w* ear, \w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* Jacob. (Selah.)

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, let \w your|strong="H3068"\w* eyes \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H8085"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* safe cover, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* let \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* turned \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* king.

\w For|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* day \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H7200"\w* house \w is|strong="H0430"\w* better than \w a|strong="H7200"\w* thousand. \w It|strong="H7200"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* better \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* door-keeper \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* house \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, than \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* living \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* tents \w of|strong="H0430"\w* sin.

\w The|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* sun \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w our|strong="H0430"\w* strength: \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord \w will|strong="H0430"\w* give grace \w and|strong="H0430"\w* glory: \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* keep \w back|strong="H1004"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H0977"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* whose ways \w are|strong="H3117"\w* upright.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w armies|strong="H3808"\w*, \w happy|strong="H2896"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* man whose hope \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.
